list.name: accounts_top_n
list.label: Top N accounts (tables)
list.description: Used by leaderboard tables (yesterday + 30d totals). Set to 10000 to effectively show all accounts with activity in the time window.

list.name: accounts_top_n_realtime
list.label: Top N accounts (realtime charts)
list.description: Used by realtime timeseries charts (cost/hr, requests/min). Keep small; large values make charts unreadable and heavier to render.

panels.title: Cost/hr (USD, total)
panels.description: Total proxy cost burn rate in USD/hour for the selected model filter. Computed from codex_lb_proxy_cost_usd_total using a 1h rate window and multiplied by 3600.

panels.title: Cost/hr by model (USD, stacked)
panels.description: Same as 'Cost/hr (USD, total)' but split by model and stacked so each layer shows that model's USD/hour contribution.

panels.title: Tokens/min by kind (total)
panels.description: Token throughput per minute, split by token kind (input, output, cached_input). Uses a 1h rate window so short spikes are smoothed.

panels.title: Cache hit % (input tokens, 1h buckets)
panels.description: Input-token cache hit rate in percent for 1h buckets. Formula: 100 * cached_input_tokens / input_tokens over each 1h interval. Zero-input windows render as a gap.

panels.title: Requests/min by model
panels.description: Request throughput per minute, split by model, for the selected API/model filters. Uses a 1h rate window.

panels.title: Error rate
panels.description: Overall request error percentage for the selected filters. Formula: 100 * error_request_rate / total_request_rate over a 1h rate window. Zero-request windows render as a gap.

panels.title: Latency p50/p95 (global, s)
panels.description: Global server-side latency inside codex-lb (codex-lb -> upstream -> codex-lb). Shows p50 (median) and p95 (tail). For streaming APIs this measures full stream duration, not time-to-first-token.

panels.title: Cost/successful request (avg, USD)
panels.description: Average USD per successful request for the selected filters. Formula: cost_rate / successful_request_rate using 1h rates. No-success windows render as a gap.

panels.title: Latency p95 by model (s)
panels.description: Per-model p95 latency (tail latency), measured on the server side inside codex-lb. For streaming APIs this is full stream duration.

panels.title: Top 10 error codes
panels.description: Top 10 error_code series by current occurrence rate, using a 1h rate window. Useful for seeing which failures dominate right now.

panels.title: Top $accounts_top_n_realtime accounts by cost/hr
panels.description: Top $accounts_top_n_realtime accounts by cost burn rate (USD/hour), using a 1h rate window. Legend names come from account identity labels.

targets.expr: label_replace(topk($accounts_top_n_realtime, sum by (account_id) (rate(codex_lb_proxy_account_cost_usd_total{account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[1h])) * 3600) * on(account_id) group_left(display) ((codex_lb_account_identity @ end()) or on(account_id) label_replace(count by (account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent), "display", "$1", "account_id", "(.*)")), "account_id", "$1", "display", "(.*)")

panels.title: Top $accounts_top_n_realtime accounts by requests/min
panels.description: Top $accounts_top_n_realtime accounts by request throughput (requests/min), using a 1h rate window. Legend names come from account identity labels.

targets.expr: label_replace(topk($accounts_top_n_realtime, sum by (account_id) (rate(codex_lb_proxy_account_requests_total{account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[1h])) * 60) * on(account_id) group_left(display) ((codex_lb_account_identity @ end()) or on(account_id) label_replace(count by (account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent), "display", "$1", "account_id", "(.*)")), "account_id", "$1", "display", "(.*)")

panels.title: Error rate by account (Top 10, %)
panels.description: Top 10 accounts by request error percentage. Formula per account: 100 * account_error_request_rate / account_total_request_rate over a 1h rate window. Zero-request windows render as a gap.

targets.expr: label_replace(topk(10, ((100 * (sum by (account_id) (rate(codex_lb_proxy_account_requests_total{status="error",account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[1h])) / sum by (account_id) (rate(codex_lb_proxy_account_requests_total{account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[1h])))) and on(account_id) (sum by (account_id) (rate(codex_lb_proxy_account_requests_total{account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[1h])) > 0))) * on(account_id) group_left(display) ((codex_lb_account_identity @ end()) or on(account_id) label_replace(count by (account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent), "display", "$1", "account_id", "(.*)")), "account_id", "$1", "display", "(.*)")

panels.title: Routing: selections/min by outcome
panels.description: How often the load balancer selects an account, split by pool and selection outcome. Shown as selections per minute from a 1h rate window.

panels.title: Routing: mark events/min
panels.description: How often routing logic marks accounts, split by event type. Events include rate_limit (including usage_limit_reached), quota_exceeded, permanent_failure, and error.

panels.title: Latency p50 by model (s)
panels.description: Per-model p50 latency (median latency), measured on the server side inside codex-lb. For streaming APIs this is full stream duration.

panels.title: Cost/hr by account (selected)
panels.description: Cost burn rate (USD/hour) for the currently selected accounts. Uses a 1h rate window and account identity labels.

targets.expr: label_replace((sum by (account_id) (rate(codex_lb_proxy_account_cost_usd_total{account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[1h])) * 3600) * on(account_id) group_left(display) ((codex_lb_account_identity @ end()) or on(account_id) label_replace(count by (account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent), "display", "$1", "account_id", "(.*)")), "account_id", "$1", "display", "(.*)")

panels.title: Requests/min by account (selected)
panels.description: Request throughput (requests/min) for the currently selected accounts. Uses a 1h rate window and account identity labels.

targets.expr: label_replace((sum by (account_id) (rate(codex_lb_proxy_account_requests_total{account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[1h])) * 60) * on(account_id) group_left(display) ((codex_lb_account_identity @ end()) or on(account_id) label_replace(count by (account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent), "display", "$1", "account_id", "(.*)")), "account_id", "$1", "display", "(.*)")

panels.title: Usage refresh failures/min (status + phase)
panels.description: Usage refresh failures per minute, grouped by HTTP status and phase. phase=initial_fetch is first attempt; phase=post_refresh_retry is retry after token refresh.

panels.title: Retries/min (by error class)
panels.description: Retry attempts per minute, grouped by retry error class, using a 1h rate window.

panels.title: Estimated Weekly Quota (USD, 7d)
panels.description: Estimated weekly quota per account from recent observed behavior. Uses last-7-day spend plus secondary usage percent to infer quota; $secondary_quota_min_pp filters low-signal accounts.

targets.expr: max by (account_id, account_display) (label_join(((codex_lb_secondary_implied_quota_usd_7d{account_id=~"$account"} and on(account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent_delta_pp_7d{account_id=~"$account"} >= $secondary_quota_min_pp)) * on(account_id) group_left(display, plan_type) ((codex_lb_account_identity @ end()) or on(account_id) label_replace(label_replace(count by (account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent), "display", "$1", "account_id", "(.*)"), "plan_type", "unknown", "account_id", "(.*)"))), "account_display", "::", "plan_type", "display"))

panels.title: Daily rollups (requires Prometheus running)
panels.description: Daily rollup section. Panels below focus on completed-day totals (not in-progress partial days).

panels.title: Cost/day (USD, completed days + 7d avg)
panels.description: Daily total cost in USD for completed days, plus a 7-day average trend line. Rightmost bar is typically yesterday.

panels.title: Cost yesterday (USD, top $accounts_top_n accounts)
panels.description: Top $accounts_top_n accounts by yesterday's total cost (last completed day in browser timezone).

targets.expr: max by (account_id, account_display) (label_join((topk($accounts_top_n, sum by (account_id) (increase(codex_lb_proxy_account_cost_usd_total{account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[1d]))) * on(account_id) group_left(display, plan_type) (0 * (codex_lb_account_identity or on(account_id) label_replace(label_replace(count by (account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent), "display", "$1", "account_id", "(.*)"), "plan_type", "unknown", "account_id", "(.*)")) + 1)), "account_display", "::", "plan_type", "display"))

panels.title: Requests/day (total + 7d avg)
panels.description: Daily total requests for completed days, plus a 7-day average trend line. Rightmost bar is typically yesterday.

panels.title: Requests yesterday (top $accounts_top_n accounts)
panels.description: Top $accounts_top_n accounts by yesterday's total requests (last completed day in browser timezone).

targets.expr: max by (account_id, account_display) (label_join((topk($accounts_top_n, sum by (account_id) (increase(codex_lb_proxy_account_requests_total{account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[1d]))) * on(account_id) group_left(display, plan_type) (0 * (codex_lb_account_identity or on(account_id) label_replace(label_replace(count by (account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent), "display", "$1", "account_id", "(.*)"), "plan_type", "unknown", "account_id", "(.*)")) + 1)), "account_display", "::", "plan_type", "display"))

panels.title: Cost (USD, 30d total, top $accounts_top_n accounts)
panels.description: Top $accounts_top_n accounts by total cost over the last 30 completed days.

targets.expr: max by (account_id, account_display) (label_join((topk($accounts_top_n, sum by (account_id) (increase(codex_lb_proxy_account_cost_usd_total{account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[30d]))) * on(account_id) group_left(display, plan_type) (0 * (codex_lb_account_identity or on(account_id) label_replace(label_replace(count by (account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent), "display", "$1", "account_id", "(.*)"), "plan_type", "unknown", "account_id", "(.*)")) + 1)), "account_display", "::", "plan_type", "display"))

panels.title: Requests (30d total, top $accounts_top_n accounts)
panels.description: Top $accounts_top_n accounts by total requests over the last 30 completed days.

targets.expr: max by (account_id, account_display) (label_join((topk($accounts_top_n, sum by (account_id) (increase(codex_lb_proxy_account_requests_total{account_id=~"$account",api=~"$api"}[30d]))) * on(account_id) group_left(display, plan_type) (0 * (codex_lb_account_identity or on(account_id) label_replace(label_replace(count by (account_id) (codex_lb_secondary_used_percent), "display", "$1", "account_id", "(.*)"), "plan_type", "unknown", "account_id", "(.*)")) + 1)), "account_display", "::", "plan_type", "display"))

panels.title: Today (since 00:00, browser TZ)
panels.description: Today-only section anchored to local midnight (browser timezone). Note: if dashboard time is set to an absolute range, Grafana may apply that absolute window instead of this panel-relative override.

panels.title: Cost — today so far
panels.description: Total cost accumulated so far today since local midnight (browser timezone). Note: if dashboard time is set to an absolute range, Grafana may apply that absolute window instead of this panel-relative override.

panels.title: Projected EOD cost (run-rate)
panels.description: Projected end-of-day cost from current pace since midnight (run-rate estimate). Note: if dashboard time is set to an absolute range, Grafana may apply that absolute window instead of this panel-relative override.

panels.title: Cost/hr (USD, total, 1h buckets)
panels.description: Observed hourly cost buckets since midnight (browser timezone). Projected EOD is shown in the dedicated stat panel above. Note: if dashboard time is set to an absolute range, Grafana may apply that absolute window instead of this panel-relative override.
